project_name.justification: The project is identified in the metadata section at the end of the document: 'Project Name Emigrant Springs Project'

company_name.justification: The company is identified in the first paragraph: 'Peloton Minerals Corporation (“PMC” or the “Company”) (CSE:PMC) (OTC:PMCCF) has staked and filed for recording 98 new mineral claims...'

ceo_buyer.justification: The CEO is listed in the contact information section of the text: 'Edward (Ted) Ellwood, MBA President & CEO'

interest_acquired_percent.justification: The article describes the staking of new claims directly by the company, not the acquisition of a specific interest percentage from another party.

primary_commodity.justification: The article title and body mention the commodity: 'Peloton Stakes 98 New Mineral Claims in NE Nevada to Cover Potential Lithium Bearing Hectorite and illitic Clays...'

verified_article_link.justification: No verifiable article link is provided in the source text.

currency.justification: The article does not mention any financial transaction, so no currency is specified.

cash_payments_raw.justification: The article is about staking claims and does not involve cash payments for an acquisition.

share_payments_raw.justification: The article is about staking claims and does not involve share payments for an acquisition.

cash_and_share_payments_combined_raw.justification: The article is about staking claims and does not involve combined cash and share payments for an acquisition.

amount_of_shares_issued.justification: The article is about staking claims and does not involve the issuance of shares for an acquisition.

share_warrant_payments_raw.justification: No share warrants are mentioned as part of a transaction.

option_payments_raw.justification: No options are mentioned as part of a transaction.

issued_share_price.justification: The article is about staking claims and does not involve a transaction with a specified share price.

exploration_commitment_meters.justification: The article mentions plans for exploration but does not specify a commitment in meters.

exploration_commitment_value_raw.justification: The article mentions plans to source exploration capital but does not state a specific monetary exploration commitment: 'The Company has retained IBK Capital Corporation of Toronto to source lithium exploration capital.'

nsr_acquired_percent.justification: No Net Smelter Royalty (NSR) is mentioned in the text.

coverage_area_raw.justification: The text states the total size of the land position after the new staking: 'The total ground position now held by the Company in the area is 186 mineral claims or about 1,500 hectares (3,700 acres).'

coverage_area_unit.justification: The unit for the coverage area is specified in the text: '...1,500 hectares (3,700 acres).'

resource_size.justification: The text mentions 'potential lithium bearing hectorite and illitic clays' but does not provide a quantified mineral resource estimate for the project.

buyer_ticker_and_exchange.justification: The company's ticker and exchange are provided in the first paragraph: 'Peloton Minerals Corporation (“PMC” or the “Company”) (CSE:PMC) (OTC:PMCCF)'.
